title: evaru manaku
sahitya:
evaru manaku samAnam ilalO nintulAra nEDu



anupallavi



avani harihara bramhAdi surulAsace mOsa pOyiri ganukanu



caraNam



naluva tanayapai mOhamu jendi nADu tagili pOye muddu lolugu

shrIhari

    valacucu brndA lOluDai pOye ciluva bhUSaNuDu tArukAvanapu

celula

    pAlaya gOkulamuna tyAgarAjanutuDu mana valla digili pOye

ganukanu
